message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of named entity recognition and co-reference resolution for text segmentation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). The paper also evaluates the performance of different text segmentation algorithms, which is related to machine learning and information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
